name: Standing desk
description: Perfect desk for the home, a standing desk has been proven to be a good way to stay in shape while working on a computer

name: Office chair
description: Comfortable chair, working at home shouldn't mean hurting your back

name: Office light
description: Nice looking office light, perfect for dark offices.

name: Ergonomic keyboard
description: Laptop keyboards are good when you're travelling or working from a coffeeshop, but a real ergonomic keyboard will make working at home more comfortable, and more productive.
